Iff this isn’t a real seller there is a special place for him using that type of story.. no accusations, just a statement.

garbage Cobbs...in reality 2k and a 900...everyone keeps driving them up and only a  few will get them, a total FUP in the hobby...Cobb has greater stats then Jax, but because he lost  a shoe or whatever and/or Bidens vocabulary he is  stud...so do you  have a JAX  FS...lol
